Blockquotes

Blockquotes can have transparent or shaded backgrounds.

Before they sold out pickled bicycle rights pabst. Biodiesel slow-carb cardigan ugh swag pop-up. Hella ethical etsy bushwick tofu forage. Hoodie cray cred, master cleanse squid brunch marfa polaroid man bun. Keytar forage synth mlkshk neutra. Sustainable gastropub pork belly, single-origin coffee 8-bit freegan cornhole wolf kale chips ennui direct trade fap franzen lomo. Kitsch tacos tote bag ramps, normcore before they sold out try-hard.
Before they sold out pickled bicycle rights pabst. Biodiesel slow-carb cardigan ugh swag pop-up. Hella ethical etsy bushwick tofu forage. Hoodie cray cred, master cleanse squid brunch marfa polaroid man bun. Keytar forage synth mlkshk neutra. Colors

Many elements in the Barista Framework can be assigned a color scheme. The preferred method of specifying a color scheme is by purpose.

default A gray color scheme, applied to all color-themed elements by default

primary A blue color scheme for identifying important actions and elements

success A green color scheme for reporting successful actions and events

error A red color scheme for reporting fatal errors or warning of destructive actions. This color scheme can also be referenced as danger

warning A yellow color scheme for reporting non-fatal errors or unexpected results

info A cyan color scheme for reporting relevant information

<p class="txt"> <code class="lbl">default</code> A gray color scheme, applied to all color-themed elements by default </p> <p class="txt primary"> <code class="lbl primary">primary</code> A blue color scheme for identifying important actions and elements </p> <p class="txt success"> <code class="lbl success">primary</code> A green color scheme for reporting successful actions and events </p> <p class="txt error"> <code class="lbl error">primary</code> A red color scheme for reporting fatal errors or warning of destructive actions. <em>This color scheme can also be referenced as</em> <code>danger</code> </p> <p class="txt warning"> <code class="lbl warning">primary</code> A yellow color scheme for reporting non-fatal errors or unexpected results </p> <p class="txt info"> <code class="lbl info">primary</code> A cyan color scheme for reporting relevant information </p>

Color schemes can also be referenced by color names. For brevity, these colors will not be demonstrated elsewhere in these documents but any element which can be assigned a color scheme by purpose can also be assigned a color scheme by name.

red Color Scheme

green Color Scheme

blue Color Scheme

cyan Color Scheme

magenta Color Scheme

yellow Color Scheme

purple Color Scheme

orange Color Scheme

<div class="lbl red">red</div> <div class="lbl green">green</div> <div class="lbl blue">blue</div> <div class="lbl cyan">cyan</div> <div class="lbl magenta">magenta</div> <div class="lbl yellow">yellow</div> <div class="lbl purple">purple</div> <div class="lbl orange">orange</div>

Buttons

Buttons can be generated with button tags or any generic element with the .btn class.

Link Text

<button>Button</button> <a class="btn">Link</a> <span class="btn">Text</span>

Styles

Buttons also come in toggle and text styles

Default Toggle Text

<a class="btn">Default</a> <a class="btn toggle">Toggle</a> <a class="btn text">Text</a>

Sizes

Buttons also come in large and small sizes

Large Default Small

<a class="btn lg">Large</a> <a class="btn">Default</a> <a class="btn sm">Small</a>

Colors

Buttons can also be assigned a color scheme

Default style

Primary Success Error Warning Info

<a class="btn primary">Primary</a> <a class="btn success">Success</a> <a class="btn error">Error</a> <a class="btn Warning">Warning</a> <a class="btn info">Info</a>
Text style

Primary Success Error Warning Info

<a class="btn text primary">Primary</a> <a class="btn text success">Success</a> <a class="btn text error">Error</a> <a class="btn text Warning">Warning</a> <a class="btn text info">Info</a>

Groups

First Second Third
Toggle Select Group
Single Select Group
<div class="btn-group"> <a class="btn">First</a> <a class="btn">Second</a> <a class="btn">Third</a> </div> <div class="btn-group toggle"> <a class="btn">Toggle</a> <a class="btn">Select</a> <a class="btn">Group</a> </div> <div class="btn-group single"> <a class="btn">Single</a> <a class="btn">Select</a> <a class="btn">Group</a> </div>

Cards

Cards are generic containers with a header and footer.

Card

Before they sold out pickled bicycle rights pabst. Biodiesel slow-carb cardigan ugh swag pop-up. Hella ethical etsy bushwick tofu forage. Hoodie cray cred, master cleanse squid brunch marfa polaroid man bun. Keytar forage synth mlkshk neutra. Sustainable gastropub pork belly, single-origin coffee 8-bit freegan cornhole wolf kale chips ennui direct trade fap franzen lomo. Kitsch tacos tote bag ramps, normcore before they sold out try-hard.

Footer
<div class="card"> <header>Card</header> <p>Before they sold out pickled bicycle rights pabst. Biodiesel slow-carb cardigan ugh swag pop-up. Hella ethical etsy bushwick tofu forage. Hoodie cray cred, master cleanse squid brunch marfa polaroid man bun. Keytar forage synth mlkshk neutra. Sustainable gastropub pork belly, single-origin coffee 8-bit freegan cornhole wolf kale chips ennui direct trade fap franzen lomo. Kitsch tacos tote bag ramps, normcore before they sold out try-hard.</p> <footer>Footer</footer> </div>

Cards can also be assigned a color scheme.

Alerts

Alerts are a simplified variant of cards for content that does not need a header or footer.

This is a default alert.
<div class="card alert">This is a default alert.</div>

Alerts can also be assigned a color scheme.

Primary message
Success message
Error message
Warning message
Information message
<div class="card alert primary">Primary message</div> <div class="card alert success">Success message</div> <div class="card alert error">Error message</div> <div class="card alert warning">Warning message</div> <div class="card alert info">Information message</div>

Footer

Modal Cards

Cards can be displayed as modal views by adding the modal class to the card and using a link or button to target the card.

<div class="card modal" id="modal-default"> <header>Default Modal Card</header> <p>This is the default style for modal cards.</p> <a class="ok">Dismiss<a> <footer>Default card footer</footer> </div> <button data-action="modal" data-target="#modal-default">Default</button>

Overlay

By default, the dimmed overlay will appear behind the modal card. This can be disabled using the data-overlay="false" attribute on the targetting link or button.

<button data-action="modal" data-target="#modal-default" data-overlay="false">No Overlay</button>

By default, clicking outside the card will dismiss the modal. This can be disabled using the data-overlay="static" attribute on the targetting link or button.

<button data-action="modal" data-target="#modal-default" data-overlay="static">Static Overlay</button>

Duration

By default, the modal card will remain visible until it is dismissed. A modal can be automatically dismissed after a specified delay using the data-duration attribute on the targetting link or button. The duration is specified in milliseconds.

<button data-action="modal" data-target="#modal-default" data-duration="1300">Auto-dismiss</button>

Action Buttons

Modal cards can trigger actions using buttons in the card footer. Adding the btns class to the card footer will evenly distribute any buttons it contains. Buttons with a class of ok or cancel will trigger an event of the same names on the card.

<div class="card modal warning" id="modal-warning"> <header>Warning Modal Card</header> <p>Are you sure you want to do this thing?</p> <footer class="btns"> <button class="cancel">Cancel</button> <button class="ok">Do it!</button> </footer> </div> <button data-action="modal" data-target="#modal-warning">Dialog</button> <script type="text/javascript"> $('#modal-warning').on('ok', function() { setTimeout(function() { $('#modal-success').modal({ overlay: false, duration: 1300 }); }, 700); }); </script>
Default Modal Card

This is the default style for modal cards.

Dismiss
Default card footer
Warning Modal Card
Are you sure you want to do this thing?
You were successful!
